Articles.Content:
Well I finally finished up with things, Below are my M12 Light Recon Vehicle line up. I know someone made one for KSP, i kinda added to the concept. just showing the models off, ![p>

No IVA]() I present, RECON SQUAD DELTA. (\*\*NOTE\*\* Wheels are from the Warthog on KerbalStuff, cant remember the authors name. the Vehicles are not, they are from free 3d models) "Niles" (P.s.) Sorry again in advance if this is in the wrong place. **Edited May 19, 2015 by Niles\_Ferrier** missing info
Wow! Even though the thread is a little stale (6 months) great job! Got a DL link for them?
